instructions: Show bars: Displays the audio data around the sun and moon as bars.
Show Circles: Displays the audio data around the sun and moon as 'circles'.
Invert Colors: Will invert the colors displayed.
Emboss: Displays a grey-scale sort of height map of the canvas.
Highshelf Filter: Emphasises the high-frequency sounds.
Lowshelf Filter: Emphasises the low-frequency sounds.
Distortion: Will distort the audio and display a graphic based on distortion.
